com.jsoft.linkbuild.client
Class ClientLibrary

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
      com.jsoft.linkbuild.client.ClientLibrary
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.bluetooth.DiscoveryListener, javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener
public abstract class ClientLibrary
extends javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
implements javax.bluetooth.DiscoveryListener, javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener

This class must be extendend by Client to use connectToServer method and to seceive data
